{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R6700 |revision=v3 |series=AC1750 |manuf_country=Vietnam |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H332 |manuf_rev=T77 |fcc_date=11/13/2017 |fcc_id=PY316200342 |pcb_id=U12H332T77 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708C0;BCM4708C0KFEBG, UT1633 P10, 616240-08 B1 W; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1631 P20, 612273-01 3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331;BCM4331KMLG, TE1626 P21, 604681-32 3 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=DFS |tp_firmware=DD-WRT (Kong-AC ARM), FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3-stream 802.11ac device (80MHz wide 5GHz channel), :• '''450''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1750 Smart WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R6700.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R6700v3}} *OEM: [[Foxconn]] ([[Ambit]]) [https://github.com/mirror/dd-wrt/blob/master/src/router/netgear/ambitCfg-r6400v2.h U12H332T77] A Class II Permissive Change request was submitted to the FCC on 11/13/2017 adding
this new model to PY316200342 with the following changes from the [[Netgear R6400v2]]: * Reduce the Heatspreader's size from 226x127 to 196x90 * Remove 2 shielding can on bottom PCBA __NOTOC__
